templates.text: From the {data} we can derive that the {topography} of the {planet_type} we orbit must feel {topography_texture_1} and {topography_texture_2}. The most {prominent} features are {topography_feature_1_name}. {topography_feature_1_description}. But while less {prominent}, there are also {topography_feature_2_name} which are scattered throughout the planet.
